alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 08 at 1:10PM MDT until May 09 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 40 mph with gusts exceeding 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, East Platte County and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills
